name: Palm Tree LLC
tagline: Private equity-focused M&A advisor born out of PE
description: As a single-source partner, Palm Tree integrates financial, operational, analytical, and capital solutions to advise and execute value-creation initiatives that drive transactions, transitions, and transformations. We guide private equity firms through high-stakes processes, engaging with them to highlight opportunities, mitigate risks, and reduce deal friction. Our integrated services work alongside management teams to help them prepare for, navigate, and succeed in strategic events so they can focus on company performance and preserving operational capacity. We were born out of private equity. It gives us the resilience, flexibility, and perspective of owners and operators. Our team comes from private equity, Big-4 accounting, investment banking, and business operations experience.
known_for: The modern M&A advisor for private equity, Palm Tree is unique as a one-stop-shop specializing in the full PE deal lifecycle. With 600+ engagements across 6 continents totaling $75B+ in transaction value, they bring hands-on expertise from private equity, Big-4, and investment banking backgrounds.
career_path: Analyst (2-3 yrs) → Senior Analyst (2-3 yrs) → Associate (2-3 yrs) → Vice President → Principal

recruiting.process: Resume → Behavioral Round (recruiting team) → Peer Fit Interview → Case Study (4-6 hrs) → Technical Review (1 hr with senior member) → Final Rounds (culture fit)
recruiting.unique: Extended 4-6 hour case study conducted off-hours or over the weekend, followed by detailed technical review with senior leadership
recruiting.timeline: Rolling applications year-round, 3-4 weeks from application to offer

byu.tip: Limited BYU presence—network with the single current alumnus and reach out directly to LA office recruiters
